newsitem.title: USA: Krantor sees profit in Q1, full year.
newsitem.headline: Krantor sees profit in Q1, full year.

text.p: Krantor Corp said Wednesday it sees a profit of about $100,000, or $0.004 per share, for the first quarter ending March 31, 1997 and a profit of about $550,000, or $0.022 per share, for the full year.

The company believes it has reversed a trend of losses resulting from the discontinuation of its Kosher food business in June 1996. It said there should be no negative impact on earnings in 1997 from discontinued operations. Krantor reported a fourth quarter per share loss of $0.27, including a charge of $0.28 per share related to discontinued operations.
